wikipedia_page.main: Alfred William Wilcock (1887–1953) was a cathedral organist, who served in Derby Cathedral and Exeter Cathedral.

link_mentions.page: List of musicians at English cathedrals

response: He was born in 1906 in Aldershot, Hampshire. He studied organ at Exeter Cathedral under Dr. Thomas Armstrong and Dr. Alfred William Wilcock. He was awarded his FRCO in 1936.Western Morning News, 3 August 1936
